message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for my product. I'm willing to go down to $82. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $75?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to go down to $79. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $76?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to go down to $78. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand that you're making a final offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $77?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to go down to $79. This is my absolute final offer. What do you think?
I understand that this is your absolute final offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $79 and $77. Would you be willing to go down to $78?
